author: Marie Brewis
title: How to secure Facebook: How to avoid new Facebook Messenger scam
text: How to secure Facebook | How to avoid Facebook scams & hoaxes: Facebook adds Security Key login support How to secure Facebook: How to avoid new Facebook Messenger scam Facebook is full of scams, hoaxes and people too nosey for their own good. Here's how to avoid Facebook scams and Facebook hoaxes, and protect your privacy on Facebook. How to secure Facebook. Plus: How to avoid the new Facebook Messenger scam. Facebook is an awesome place to keep in touch with friends, but it can be dangerous. Here's how to protect your Facebook privacy
